CANFD_MCANGlobalFiltConfig_t Struct Reference
CANFD Driver » CANFD Driver External Data Structures

Data structure defines the MCAN Global Filter Configuration parameters. More...

#include <drivers/canfd/canfd.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t rrfe
 
uint32_t rrfs
 
uint32_t anfe
 
uint32_t anfs
 

Detailed Description

Data structure defines the MCAN Global Filter Configuration parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CANFD_MCANGlobalFiltConfig_t::anfe

Accept Non-matching Frames Extended 0 = Accept in Rx FIFO 0 1 = Accept in Rx FIFO 1 others = Reject

uint32_t CANFD_MCANGlobalFiltConfig_t::anfs

Accept Non-matching Frames Standard 0 = Accept in Rx FIFO 0 1 = Accept in Rx FIFO 1 others = Reject

uint32_t CANFD_MCANGlobalFiltConfig_t::rrfe

Reject Remote Frames Extended 0 = Filter remote frames with 29-bit extended IDs 1 = Reject all remote frames with 29-bit extended IDs

uint32_t CANFD_MCANGlobalFiltConfig_t::rrfs

Reject Remote Frames Standard 0 = Filter remote frames with 11-bit standard IDs 1 = Reject all remote frames with 11-bit standard IDs
